footer.tagline: Your trusted partner in buying cars from South Korea. Hyundai, Kia, Genesis — best prices and quality.

buy.title: How to Buy a Car from Korea
buy.subtitle: Complete guide through the buying process. We'll walk you through all 8 steps
buy.readyDescription: Choose a car from our catalog and begin your journey to the perfect vehicle

step1.title: Choose a Car
step1.description: Browse our catalog of cars from South Korea. Filter by brand, model, year, and price. Find the perfect option for you.

step2.title: Make a Deposit
step2.description: Make a deposit of 2,000,000 won from the car's cost. We'll reserve the car for you and start the paperwork.
step2.highlight: All funds are insured and guaranteed to be returned if the car doesn't suit you.

step3.title: Inspection and Check
step3.description: Our specialist conducts a full inspection of the car in South Korea. You'll receive a photo and video report with all details.

step4.title: Pay the Balance
step4.description: After confirmation, pay the remaining amount. We'll purchase the car and start preparing it for export.

step5.title: Customs Processing
step5.description: Our team handles all customs procedures. The car is processed for export to Russia with all necessary documents.

step6.title: Delivery to Russia
step6.description: The car is shipped to Russia by sea. We track every stage of delivery and keep you informed.
step6.highlight: Delivery to Vladivostok typically takes 7-14 days depending on the destination.

step7.title: Customs Clearance
step7.description: Upon arrival in Russia, we assist with customs clearance. All fees and taxes are paid according to Russian legislation.

step8.title: Receive Your Car
step8.description: Your car is ready for pickup! We'll hand over the car with all necessary documents and keys.
step8.highlight: Congratulations! Your new car is now ready to use.
